User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; Intel Mac OS X 10.5; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13

Am currently using 3.6.13 and got the update offer flashed on screen. Declined a couple of times because I was busy, then tonight when I accepted. It appeared to start loading but went nowhere, so I closed the window.

Reproducible: Didn't try

Actual Results:  
Stalled update

Expected Results:  
updated to version 3.6.15
